feed.title: Climate Experiences Project
feed.subtitle: This site presents the research of the Climate Experiences Project, based at the Universities of Birmingham and Nottingham in the UK and funded by Research England.

entry.title: Climate Experiences project launch
entry.content: We’re delighted to announce the launch of our project. Stay tuned for more as we launch our survey and start to communicate our results. If you’re using a blog reader, we’ll keep news updates here as well as across social media.
entry.summary: We’re delighted to announce the launch of our project. Stay tuned for more as we launch our survey and start to communicate our results. If you’re using a blog reader, we’ll keep news updates here as well as across social media.
